attr.title: Trogdor Reburninated
attr.desc: Trogdor Reburninated is a fan-made recreation of Trogdor for PC and consoles.
attr.desc_md:
**Trogdor Reburninated** is an enhanced recreation of the Homestar Runner Flash game, Trogdor, with new features and multiplatform support.

This project faithfully recreates the original Flash game while adding many new features:

- Includes all intermissions from the original game
- Customizable gameplay settings for enemy speed and extra lives
- Save data support for mid-game progress and high scores
- Level select and shuffle options
- New cheats beyond the original Konami code
- Optional soundtrack from another Homestar Runner game (Stinkoman 20X6)
- Screen scaling options for both full-screen and integer/pixel-perfect display
- Bug fixes for issues in the original game
- Big head mode!
attr.inst_md: Ready to play. Save data is created in the same directory as the executable.
